articles.author: Rob Edwards
articles.title: Inbetweeners star is unrecognisable with bizarre haircut and beard as he films new comedy - The Mirror
articles.description: The actor, who has also played Adam Goodman on Friday Night Dinner, is filming a new Channel 4 comedy series, but he will always be remembered for his role as Will Mckenzie
articles.content:
Once famous for playing Will McKenzie in The Inbetweeners, Simon Bird is now unrecognisable as he films a new Channel 4 comedy.

articles.title: FIRST LOOK at Love Island 2022's NEW villa: Work begins on the rustic six-bedroom Mallorcan abode - Daily Mail
articles.description: First look images of Love Island's brand new villa have been revealed ahead of the 2022 series launch this summer, with tradesmen seen making adjustments to the six-bedroom Mallorcan pad.
